org.nd4j.linalg.memory.provider

Class BasicWorkspaceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.memory.provider.BasicWorkspaceManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MemoryWorkspaceManager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CpuWorkspaceManager, CudaWorkspaceManager

    public abstract class BasicWorkspaceManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements MemoryWorkspaceManager
    Workspace manager implementation. Please note, this class is supposed to be used via Nd4j.getWorkspaceManager(), to provide consistency between different threads within given JVM process

      boolean anyWorkspaceActiveForCurrentThread()
      Determine if there are any workspaces open for the current thread.
